name: Quick Black
description:
Hi everyone, we introduce our first game which name is Quick Black. This is a basic 2d platformer game but we spent a lot of time to make this game and we tried to make each level different and special. However, there are not much levels in the game. If the game receives enough reaction we will continue to develope the game and add new levels.

By the way, our next project will be a 2D Action RPG game. We will work harder for the next game and we need your support. 

See you next time, enjoy the game !

-ŞÜKRÜ AKİF GAMES

(The game only works properly on 1080p screens, your screen resolution must be 1080p and the scale setting in windows must be 100%)
